landing.title: “What have you worked on?”
landing.description: Learn more about my past projects and positions

ca.title: Full-stack developer
ca.description: For 6 months, I was working in a team of about 12 developers on a large microservice application. I was responsible mainly for the development of the frontend, which was built with React and TypeScript. I also worked on the backend, which was built with Node.js and TypeScript.

helped.0: improving developer experience through better typings and setting TypeScript standards for the whole engineering team
helped.1: building new features from front to back, including working with REST APIs, databases and database migrations
helped.2: educating my colleagues on TypeScript through workshops and writing extensive documentation with type challenges
helped.3: enhancing existing design systems in accordance with the style guide

dt.title: Front-end developer
dt.description: My job at Designers Trust was to develop and maintain a web application from scratch. I was working exclusively on the frontend built in React and TypeScript. Thanks to my and my colleague's work, the application is very thouroughly typed.

helped.0: building the whole application from scratch to it being connected to over 150 endpoints
helped.1: ensuring top-notch type safety by securing over 99% type coverage
helped.2: executing many refactors, e.g. from JavaScript to TypeScript
helped.3: building user interfaces in accordance with the style guide
